Detailed Description

Represents an audio file.

Member Function Documentation

inlinevirtual

The name of this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its name

◆ namespaceName()

virtual const char* rev::AudioResource::namespaceName ( ) const
inlinevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_audioSource

SoLoud::AudioSource* rev::AudioResource::m_audioSource = nullptr
protected

Audio source.

Audio sources contain all of the information pertaining to each sound. Shorter sounds that are used frequently should use Wav, longer should use WavStream, since WavStream consumes less memory (at the cost of processing power)
